attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of our beautiful Country Side is covered in Litter and Refuse Dumping I would like the Government to Name and Shame Litter Louts with Stiff Penalty's and a few hours of Litter Picking up teaching them a lesson it cost's us Ratepayers a bomb to clear and not enough is done ever as ther is allways more.
